name: Sneak
simple_description: Move closer without entering a visible hex.

name: Charge
simple_description: Move towards closest explorer. Attack adjacent. If no adjacent, move again.

name: Onslaught
simple_description: Attack closest and then attack (may be different target if first one taken out or another is equally close).

name: Fall Back
simple_description: Double move value. If possible, move to a hex that is not visible. Otherwise attack closest.

name: Overcharge
simple_description: Overcharged attack to closest and visible.

name: Alert
simple_description: Threat level +1. Onslaught. If threat level is 3, onslaught and re-roll failed.

name: Regenerate
simple_description: Remove wound. If can't, Disrupt instead.

name: Empower
simple_description: Place empowered marker until wounded. If can't, Disrupt.

name: Annihilate
simple_description: Place empowered marker beside this unit. Attack adjacent explorer. Re-roll failed attack rolls. This unit remains empowered until suffered any wound.

name: Disrupt
description: Discard one unspent activation or destiny dice. If not available, one explorer suffers a wound.
simple_description: Discard one unspent activation or destiny dice. If not available, one explorer suffers a wound.

name: Pounce
simple_description: If adjacent explorer, Onslaught. Otherwise Charge. Re-roll failed attack rolls.

name: Tunnel
simple_description: Remove Ambull from the Battlefield and place the Ambull location marker on the hex it was removed from - any remaining actions during this activation are lost. The next time the initiative card for the Ambull is reached, do not roll on the behaviour table for the Ambull's first action. Instead, the Ambull is placed in a hex as close as possible to the explorer that is closest to the Ambull location marker. Once the Ambull has been placed, remove the Ambull location marker and roll for the Ambull's second action as normal.

name: Swipe
simple_description: Attack against each explorer adjacent and visible.
